title: The Holy Family

description: Mary seen from her PR side, with her head tilted slightly downward and toward right, her PR hand on toddler Jesus\' PL shoulder; Jesus at center looks toward Mary; Joseph, with thinning curly hair and long beard, holding staff in PR hand, in background
